param.name: basic_access
param.label: Basic Access
param.description: Level of user that can access the projectlog component.

param.name: log_access
param.label: Log Access
param.description: Level of user that can access the project logs.

param.name: doc_access
param.label: Doc Access
param.description: Level of user that can access the project documents.

param.name: edit_access
param.label: Edit Access
param.description: Level of user that can add/edit/delete projects, logs, and documents.
